mapper.select: select t.bucket_no, t.title, t.content, t.created_dt, t.completed_dt, t.complete, m.id writer_id, m.name writer_name, m.email writer_email from apus_bucket t inner join apus_member m on t.member_no=m.member_no order by t.bucket_no desc

select t.bucket_no, t.title, t.content, t.created_dt, t.completed_dt, t.complete, m.id writer_id, m.name writer_name, m.email writer_email from apus_bucket t inner join apus_member m on t.member_no=m.member_no where bucket_no=#{no}
mapper.update: update apus_bucket set completed_dt=now(), complete=1 where bucket_no=#{no}
update apus_bucket set completed_dt=null, complete=0 where bucket_no=#{no}
mapper.select: select t.bucket_no, t.title, t.content, t.created_dt, t.completed_dt, t.complete, m.id writer_id, m.name writer_name, m.email writer_email from apus_bucket t inner join apus_member m on t.member_no=m.member_no where t.title like(concat('%',#{keyword},'%')) or t.content like (concat('%',#{keyword},'%'));
